message: I propose dividing the $10000 with a 70/30 split in favor of Alice. This offers a fair distribution considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I think this is a fair starting point considering the inflation rate is higher for you than for me.

Considering the inflation rates and the previous offers, I propose a new 52.5/47.5 split. This aims to balance fairness while taking into account the diminishing value of your money more significantly due to the higher inflation rate.
